channel.title: 100 errors help

item.title: 100 errors help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

switch(npcType) { case 219: if(c.xMas >= 3) { c.getShops().openShop(88); c.xMas = 4; c.sendMessage("I think Evil Bob wanted ONLY ONE sardine"); } break; case 706: c.getDH().sendDialogues(9, npcType); break; case 1552: if(c.xMas == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(1552, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 5) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(98, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 6) { c.sendMessage("I've already completed the event"); } break; case 2479: if(c.xMas == 2) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2479, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 3) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2483, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 4) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2490, npcType); } break; case 1512: c.getDH().sendDialogues(70, 4289); break; case 6794: case 6873: c.getDH().sendDialogues(75, 4289); break; }

There was no closing brace to end the first statement

switch(npcType) {

the code i posted above i added the bracket in the correct spot.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors help
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

                switch(npcType) {
 case 219:
 if(c.xMas >= 3) {
 c.getShops().openShop(88);
 c.xMas = 4;
 c.sendMessage("I think Evil Bob wanted ONLY ONE sardine");
} 
break;
 case 706:
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(9, npcType);
 break;
 case 1552:
 if(c.xMas == 0) {
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(1552, npcType);
 } else if (c.xMas == 5) {
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(98, npcType);
 } else if (c.xMas == 6) {
 c.sendMessage("I've already completed the event");
 }
 break;
 case 2479:
 if(c.xMas == 2) {
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(2479, npcType);
 } else if (c.xMas == 3) {
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(2483, npcType);
 } else if (c.xMas == 4) {
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(2490, npcType);
 }
 break;
 case 1512:
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(70, 4289);
 break;
 case 6794:
 case 6873:
 c.getDH().sendDialogues(75, 4289);
 break;

item.title: 100 errors help
item.dc:creator: @diggy diggy
item.description:
@diggy wrote:

I’m getting 100 errors on my actionhandler. The only part i’ve edited is this

switch(npcType) { case 219: if(c.xMas >= 3) { c.getShops().openShop(88); c.xMas = 4; c.sendMessage("I think Evil Bob wanted ONLY ONE sardine"); break; case 706: c.getDH().sendDialogues(9, npcType); break; case 1552: if(c.xMas == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(1552, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 5) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(98, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 6) { c.sendMessage("I've already completed the event"); } break; case 2479: if(c.xMas == 2) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2479, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 3) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2483, npcType); } else if (c.xMas == 4) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(2490, npcType); } break; case 1512: c.getDH().sendDialogues(70, 4289); break; case 6794: case 6873: c.getDH().sendDialogues(75, 4289); break;

If you can find the error please tell me.

Read full topic
